item.title: Control SVG Groups in LaTeX
item.description: I love the powerful LaTeX drawing package TikZ and use it whenever I can, in particular for creating SVGs. Converting from PDF to SVG with Inkscape usually gives good results, visually — but what if the structure of the XML is important, as well?
